answers.author: Alex Deshuk
answers.text:
City of Mesa uses a common card for access control and time terminals.  The security system is C-Cure 9000, and time terminals are from Kronos.  The cards come with the C-Cure system, but the Kronos system can read the cards also.

author: Elizabeth Ladner
text: I am interested in whether or not there are any municipalities that have gone to using a combined RF ID key card to not only use for opening doors at municipal facilities but to track time and attendance.  I would be interested in any RFP's that your community may have used as well as the names of some companies that provide these services.
title: RF ID time and electronic locks
